title: Self Organised Criticality
description:
This is a demonstration of the 'Sandpile' experiment, a different way of showing Self Organised Criticality. This is the traditional interpretation, and produces some very interesting patterns, although they do take a significant time to process.

This differs from my other 'Sandpile' in that it does not behave as a typical sandpile does, only stacking to four grains high before cascading to the surrounding pixels.
